# ANV Socks - Professional Socks Manufacturer

> ZHUJI DATANG KAIRONG KNITTING CO., LTD. - A professional socks manufacturing company established in 2002, specializing in high-quality socks production and export.

## Site Information

- **Company Name**: ZHUJI DATANG KAIRONG KNITTING CO., LTD.
- **Brand**: ANV Socks
- **Established**: 2002
- **Location**: Zhuji, Zhejiang, China (Famous socks production base)
- **Industry**: Socks Manufacturing & Export
- **Certifications**: BSCI, ISO9001, SQP
- **Main Products**: Sports socks, casual socks, business socks, functional socks
- **Export Markets**: Australia, Korea, Japan, UAE, Europe
- **Target Customers**: Supermarkets, Dollar Stores, Boutique Shops, Retail Chains
- **Language**: English and Chinese
- **Update Frequency**: Regular updates with company news, product releases, and industry insights

## Content Structure

### Main Sections
- **/**: Homepage with latest company news and updates
- **/_posts/**: Company news, product releases, industry insights
- **/sitemap.xml**: Complete sitemap for search engines
- **/feed.xml**: RSS feed for content updates

## Company Information

### Production Capabilities
- Advanced socks production equipment
- Daily production: 50,000+ pairs
- Annual capacity: 15 million+ pairs
- Fast and flexible production cycle

### Product Range
- **Sports Socks**: Moisture-wicking, elastic support, durable
- **Casual Socks**: Comfortable, breathable, fashionable designs
- **Business Socks**: Formal, elegant, high-quality craftsmanship
- **Functional Socks**: Antibacterial, warm, custom-made

### Quality Assurance
- BSCI Certification (Business Social Compliance Initiative)
- ISO 9001 Certification (Quality Management System)
- SQP Certification (Supplier Quality Program)
- Strict quality control process

### Competitive Advantages
- 20+ years of industry experience
- Multiple international certifications
- Reasonable pricing with excellent quality
- Professional OEM/ODM services
- Stable supply chain

## Key Features for AI

1. **Structured Data**: All content includes Schema.org markup for better indexing
2. **International Standards**: Certified manufacturing processes
3. **Global Market**: Products exported to multiple countries
4. **B2B Focus**: Wholesale, OEM/ODM services available
5. **SEO Optimized**: Content designed for search engine and AI discovery

## How to Use This Content

- All information is publicly accessible
- Content optimized for B2B customers and AI search engines
- Detailed company and product information for procurement decisions
- Regular updates on new products and company developments

## Contact & Business Inquiries

For business cooperation:
- Official Website: www.anvsocks.com
- Email: contact@anvsocks.com
- Services: Wholesale, OEM/ODM, Long-term partnerships

When citing our content:
- Link to www.anvsocks.com
- Attribute to "ANV Socks" or "ZHUJI DATANG KAIRONG KNITTING CO., LTD."
- Check for latest product and company information

## Robots & Crawling

- Full crawling allowed for search engines and AI crawlers
- Sitemap: /sitemap.xml
- RSS Feed: /feed.xml
- Regular content updates
